I build things for the web.
translation.Sou um desenvolvedor fullstack. Tenho um: I am a fullstack developer. I have a solid foundation in front-end and back-end development and am skilled at creating beautiful and responsive web applications using React and its ecosystem.
translation.Ol√°! Meu nome √© Felipe Kreulich e gost: Hello! My name is Felipe Kreulich and I like creating websites. My interest in web development began in 2020, when I decided to study front-end development, so I started from the basics, with HTML, CSS and JavaScript!
translation.Continuei estudando e tive oportunidade: I continued studying and had the opportunity to study ReactJS, the framework that changed my way of seeing the front-end. After a while I was introduced to the backend where I learned about NodeJS and Python to do the backend. It does not stop there!
translation.Acabei aprendendo um pouco de Java e des: I ended up learning a little Java and developed an OS management system with MySQL.
translation.Aqui est√° algumas das tecnologias que u: Here are some of the technologies I've been using recently:
translation.Trabalhei como t√©cnico de redes e de in: I worked as a network and IT technician in the 9th Army Police Battalion, more specifically in the Technology and IT and Communications (STIC) section, where I acquired a lot of knowledge and put into practice a lot of the things I learned in my Computer Network course. . üöÄ
translation.Meu percurso como desenvolvedor full sta: My journey as a full stack developer at CSTC.Consulting has been a fascinating journey, where with each line of code, I delve deeper into the complexities of the technological universe. Since joining the company, I have had the privilege of contributing to innovative and challenging projects, shaping my path as a development professional. Every day at CSTC.Consulting is an opportunity to learn and grow. Collaborating with talented colleagues and visionary leaders has been fundamental to my professional development. The company is not just a workplace, but an environment that nurtures the flourishing of ideas, encouraging the exploration of new technologies and methodologies. üöÄ
translation.Gerencio chamados t√©cnicos com solu√ß√µ: Management called technicians with agile and efficient solutions. Google Workspace is essential in the workflow and has been fundamental to my professional growth. Contact with customers and staff reinforced the importance of communication and empathy. üöÄ
translation.Desenvolvi um web app que utiliza a API: I developed a web app that uses the GitHub API to search for users and display their information on the screen.
translation.Um projeto que teve como objetivo criar: A project that aimed to create a website to create a list of activities using its own API and database to upload activities
translation.Esse projeto foi desenvolvido com o intu: This project was developed with the aim of learning a little about API consumption, in this case an API that provides weather information for a city that the user searches for.
translation.Quer entrar em contato? Caso tenha inter: Want to get in touch? If you are interested, contact me, I will be willing to help. Or if you want to get in touch with any questions, I'll do my best!
